https://tmrev.io/movie/222560-Aro Tolbukhin in the Mind of a Killer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yyja13VQHDUHpclZdkZsxuAbxpI.jpg After a strict upbringing and the death of his beloved sister, Aro Tolbukhin leaves Hungary for Guatemala. Taken in as a political refugee at a mission, Aro grows close to Sister Carmen and becomes part of the community, but a series of misfortunes drive him to arson and murder. Now on death row, Aro is interviewed about his life and motivations by a film crew trying to understand what made him snap. Aro Tolbukhin in the Mind of a Killer
